titles.title: Prohibiting Discrimination Against Israel Act
To prohibit the United States from funding projects that discriminate against Israeli organizations that operate beyond the 1949 armistice lines.
Prohibiting Discrimination Against Israel Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Prohibiting Discrimination Against Israel Act - States that it shall be U.S. policy that no funds authorized or appropriated by federal law may be expended for any international project that prohibits participation of Israeli organizations that operate beyond the 1949 armistice line.
